template.name: description
enumerate
itemize
table
begin
template.pattern: \begin{${environment}}${cursor} \end{${environment}}

template.name: figure
sqbr
template.pattern: \left[ ${formula} \right] ${cursor}

template.name: braces
template.pattern: \left\{ ${formula} \right\} ${cursor}

template.name: @book
template.pattern: @Book{${ID}, ALTauthor = {${Author}}, ALTeditor = {${Editor}}, title = {${Title}}, publisher = {${Publisher}}, year = {${Year}}, OPTkey = {}, OPTvolume = {}, OPTnumber = {}, OPTseries = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTedition = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @booklet
template.pattern: @Booklet{${ID}, title = {${Title}}, OPTkey = {}, OPTauthor = {}, OPThowpublished = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTyear = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @article
template.pattern: @Article{${ID}, author = {${Author}}, title = {${Title}}, journal = {${Journal}}, year = {${Year}}, OPTkey = {}, OPTvolume = {}, OPTnumber = {}, OPTpages = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @inproceedings
template.pattern: @InProceedings{${ID}, author = {${Author}}, title = {${Title}}, OPTcrossref = {}, OPTkey = {}, OPTbooktitle = {}, OPTpages = {}, OPTyear = {}, OPTeditor = {}, OPTvolume = {}, OPTnumber = {}, OPTseries = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTorganization = {}, OPTpublisher = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @incollection
template.pattern: @InCollection{${ID}, author = {${Author}}, title = {${Title}}, booktitle = {${Booktitle}}, OPTcrossref = {}, OPTkey = {}, OPTpages = {}, OPTpublisher = {}, OPTyear = {}, OPTeditor = {}, OPTvolume = {}, OPTnumber = {}, OPTseries = {}, OPTtype = {}, OPTchapter = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTedition = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.description: Chapter or Pages in a Book
template.name: @inbook
template.pattern: @InBook{${ID}, ALTauthor = {${Author}}, ALTeditor = {${Editor}}, title = {${Title}}, chapter = {${Chapter}}, publisher = {${Publisher}}, year = {${Year}}, OPTkey = {}, OPTvolume = {}, OPTnumber = {}, OPTseries = {}, OPTtype = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTedition = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTpages = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @proceedings
template.pattern: @Proceedings{${ID}, title = {${Title}}, year = {${Year}}, OPTkey = {}, OPTbooktitle = {}, OPTeditor = {}, OPTvolume = {}, OPTnumber = {}, OPTseries = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTorganization = {}, OPTpublisher = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @phdthesis
template.pattern: @PhdThesis{${ID}, author = {${Author}}, title = {${Title}}, school = {${School}}, year = {${Year}}, OPTkey = {}, OPTtype = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @mastersthesis
template.pattern: @MastersThesis{${ID}, author = {${Author}}, title = {${Title}}, school = {${School}}, year = {${Year}}, OPTkey = {}, OPTtype = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @techreport
template.pattern: @TechReport{${ID}, author = {${Author}}, title = {${Title}}, institution = {${Institution}}, year = {${Year}}, OPTkey = {}, OPTtype = {}, OPTnumber = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @manual
template.pattern: @Manual{${ID}, title = {${Title}}, OPTkey = {}, OPTauthor = {}, OPTorganization = {}, OPTaddress = {}, OPTedition = {}, OPTmonth = {}, OPTyear = {}, OPTnote = {}, OPTannote = {} }

template.name: @unpublished
@misc
@string
template.pattern: @String{${variable} = {${value}}}

template.name: @preamble
template.pattern: @Preamble{}
